task.title: Connect Signal Wires
task.shortdesc: Connect the red signal wires to link the volume potentiometer, tone potentiometer, and output jack.

step.cmd: Twist the stripped ends of both red wires together, leaving the other ends separate.

info.p: Consult the diagram below for wire placement.

substep.cmd: older the twisted end to lug 2 of the volume potentiometer.
Solder one separate end to lug 1 of the tone potentiometer.
Solder the other separate end to the tip lug of the output jack.
substep.info: The tip lug is the smallest terminal on the outer edge of the output jack.

step.cmd: Verify all three connections are secure.

image.alt: Volume potentiometer showing red wire connections at lug 2

result.p: The signal path is now complete from the volume potentiometer to both the tone potentiometer and output jack.
